short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: This browser extension shows the safety of a website according to user ratings.
short.de: Diese Browser Extension zeigt die Sicherheit eine Webseite gemäß Nutzerbewertungen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension shows the safety of a website based on user ratings.

Simocoon shows the rating of trust platforms such as e.g. Web of Trust (mywot.com) Directly visible to.
Simocoon is connected to many opinion platforms for website applications.

The users of this addon can also rate the page with a thumbs up or down. The result of the evaluation is compared with the public platforms and displayed to other users.
